mapper.select: select b1.borloaninfo_id,b2.bor_name,l1.loantype_name,b3.bankinfo_name,b1.loan_number, e.emp_name,b1.loan_date,b1.loan_repayment_date,l2.loanstate_name from borloaninfo b1,borrower b2,bankinfo b3,loantype l1, loanstate l2,loanmanage l3,employee e where b1.bor_id=b2.bor_id and b1.bankinfo_id=b3.bankinfo_id and b1.emp_id=e.emp_id and b1.loan_type=l1.loantype_id and b1.borloaninfo_id=l3.loaninfo_id and l3.loanstate_id=l2.loanstate_id

select b1.borloaninfo_id,b2.bor_name,l1.loantype_name,b3.bankinfo_name,b1.loan_number, e.emp_name,b1.loan_date,b1.loan_repayment_date,l2.loanstate_name from borloaninfo b1,borrower b2,bankinfo b3,loantype l1, loanstate l2,loanmanage l3,employee e
b1.bor_id=b2.bor_id and b1.bankinfo_id=b3.bankinfo_id and b1.emp_id=e.emp_id and b1.loan_type=l1.loantype_id and b1.borloaninfo_id=l3.loaninfo_id and l3.loanstate_id=l2.loanstate_id
and b2.bor_name like '%' || '${borName}' ||'%'
and e.emp_name like '%' || '${empName}' ||'%'
and l2.loanstate_name = #{loanstateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b3.bankinfo_name = #{bankinfoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b1.loan_repayment_date between to_date('${loanDate}','yyyy/MM/dd')
and b1.loan_repayment_date between to_date('1900-01-01','yyyy/MM/dd')
and to_date('${loanRepaymentdate}','yyyy/MM/dd')
and to_date('2100-12-31','yyyy/MM/dd')
